TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScaffoldColumnAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定類別或資料行是否使用 Scaffolding。

span.span: Specifies whether a class or data column uses scaffolding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Scaffolding 可用來產生資料庫結構描述為基礎的網頁範本的機制。Scaffolding is the mechanism for generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET Dynamic Data 使用 scaffolding 產生 Web 式 UI，可讓使用者檢視並更新資料庫。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. 這個類別會使用屬性，以啟用 scaffolding 在 Dynamic Data 網站。This class uses the property to enable scaffolding in a Dynamic Data Web Site. Scaffolding 會動態顯示基礎資料模型，與任何所需的實體頁面的頁面，以增強 ASP.NET 網頁架構。Scaffolding enhances ASP.NET page framework by dynamically displaying pages based on the data model with no physical pages required. Scaffolding 會提供下列功能：Scaffolding provides the following capabilities: - 最少或沒有程式碼來建立資料驅動 Web 應用程式。Minimal or no code to create a data-driven Web application. - 快速的開發時間。Quick development time. - 頁面包含完整的功能，包括顯示、 insert、 編輯、 刪除、 排序和分頁功能。Pages that are fully functional and include display, insert, edit, delete, sorting, and paging functionalities. - 資料庫結構描述為基礎的內建的資料驗證。Built-in data validation that is based on the database schema. - 篩選條件所建立的每個外部索引鍵或布林值欄位。Filters that are created for each foreign key or Boolean fields. 這個類別可用來啟用或停用的資料模型中的資料行的 scaffolding 將此屬性套用至類別代表資料表中的適當的資料欄位物件。This class can be used to enable or disable scaffolding of data columns in a data model by applying this attribute to the appropriate data field object in the class that represents the table. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示將 scaffold 屬性套用至在部分類別中產品的 ProductID 物件，並將它設定為 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫中的 [產品] 資料表的 ProductID 資料行`true.`它會隱藏ThumbnailPhotoFileName 資料行，將 scaffold 屬性套用至 ThumbnailPhotoFileName 物件，並將它設定為`false`。The following code example exposes the ProductID column of the Products table in the AdventureWorksLT data base by applying the scaffold property to the ProductID object in the Products partial class and setting it to `true.` It hides the ThumbnailPhotoFileName column by applying the scaffold property to the ThumbnailPhotoFileName object and setting it to `false`. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(ProductMetadata))] public partial class Product { } public class ProductMetadata { [ScaffoldColumn(true)] public object ProductID; [ScaffoldColumn(false)] public object ThumbnailPhotoFileName; } ``` ```vb Public Partial Class Product End Class Public Class ProductMetadata Public ProductID As Object Public ThumbnailPhotoFileName As Object End Class ``` 若要編譯範例程式碼，您需要下列項目：To compile the example code, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更新版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫中。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 如需有關如何下載並安裝 SQL Server 範例資料庫的資訊，請參閱[Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples:資料庫](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases)GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 請確定您已安裝您正在執行的 SQL server 版本的範例資料庫的正確版本。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - Dynamic Data 網站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 這可讓您建立資料庫和包含要自訂的資料欄位的類別和方法來覆寫的資料內容。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize and the methods to override. 此外，它會建立使用頁面之前所述的環境。In addition, it creates the environment in which to use the page described before. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：建立新的動態資料網站上，使用 Scaffolding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool scaffold) cil managed

param.name: scaffold
param.span: 指定是否啟用 Scaffolding 的值。

span.span: The value that specifies whether scaffolding is enabled.

summary.span: 使用 屬性，初始化 的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定`scaffold`要`true`整個資料模型公開的 CRUD （建立、 讀取、 更新和刪除） 作業的資料庫中的所有資料行，藉由設定`scaffold`到`true`在 Global.asax 檔中，或公開個別資料CRUD 作業，藉由設定資料表中的資料行`scaffold`至`true`在部分類別。You can set `scaffold` to `true` for the entire data model to expose all data columns in the database for CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations by setting `scaffold` to `true` in the Global.asax file or expose individual data columns in a data table to CRUD operations by setting `scaffold` to `true` in the partial class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scaffold As Boolean
public: property bool Scaffold { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定是否啟用 Scaffolding。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that specifies whether scaffolding is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用 Scaffolding 則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要啟用 scaffolding 資料模型中的個別資料行中，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to enable scaffolding in individual data columns in a data model. 如果您將這個屬性設定為`true`在 global.asax 檔案中，整個資料模型會公開 （expose) 的 CRUD （建立、 讀取、 更新和刪除） 作業的資料庫中的所有資料行。If you set this property to `true` in the global.asax file, the entire data model will expose all data columns in the database for CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations.
